sentences.en: And on the sledge sat a person whom everyone knew the moment they set eyes on him.
sentences.cn: 雪橇上坐着一个人，大家一见这人就认识了。

sentences.en: But behind him, on a much higher seat in the middle of the sledge sat a very different person - a great lady, taller than any woman that Edmund had ever seen.
sentences.cn: 在他后面，在雪橇中间一个高得多的座位上，坐着一个与众不同的女人，她比爱德蒙以前见过的任何一个女人都要高大。

sentences.en: Franois harnessed him and in a minute the sledge was moving.
sentences.cn: 弗朗索瓦给它套上了绳索.不一会儿,雪橇便启程上路了.

sentences.en: I grant a sledge - hammering sort of merit in him. ( Dickens )
sentences.cn: 我承认他身上有种强有力的优点.

sentences.en: I heaved again at my sledge, my strength boosted by visions of a cold, lonely death.
sentences.cn: 我再次去推动卡着的雪橇，想到自己会在寒冷中孤独地死去，我力气倍增。

sentences.en: It was, in short, a sledge rigged like a sloop.
sentences.cn: 原来福克先生看见的正是一条单桅船式的雪橇.

sentences.en: Italy participated in ice sledge hockey for the first time.
sentences.cn: 意大利首次参加雪橇冰棍球的比赛.

sentences.en: Last week there was a quarrel during a sledge drive.
sentences.cn: 上礼拜当雪车驶动时发生了一场争吵.

sentences.en: Once you stopped pushing how is it that the sledge keep going ?
sentences.cn: 你都已经停止推动雪橇了但是为什么它还会前进呢？

sentences.en: She travelled 14,000 miles by sledge across Siberia to Kamchatka.
sentences.cn: 她乘雪橇穿越西伯利亚到达了堪察加半岛，行程共1.4万英里。

sentences.en: Sparks flew out as the sledge hammer hit the rock.
sentences.cn: 锤子打在岩石上,迸发了好些火星儿.

sentences.en: The front sledge could be steered by a lever on the front of the frame.
sentences.cn: 前滑板可由位于机身前部的操纵杆控制.

sentences.en: The leading sledge went faster and faster.
sentences.cn: 领头的雪橇越驰越快.

sentences.en: The rear of the frame was carried on a pair of smooth irons forming a sledge.
sentences.cn: 机身的尾部安装在一对平滑的铁板上.

sentences.en: The sledge coasted down the slope.
sentences.cn: 雪撬滑下坡.

sentences.en: The sledge gained momentum as it ran down the hill.
sentences.cn: 雪橇从山上下冲时的动力越来越大.

sentences.en: The sledge gained momentum as it run down the hill.
sentences.cn: 雪橇从山上下冲时动量越来越大.

sentences.en: The sledge slid along in the midst of a plaintively intense melody.
sentences.cn: 在这种如怨如诉的和谐乐声中,在这种极其紧张的气氛中,雪橇在疯狂奔驰.

sentences.en: The sledge was steered from a platform.
sentences.cn: 滑板由操作台控制.

sentences.en: Then, holding out her arm, she let one drop fall from it on the snow beside the sledge.
sentences.cn: 然后，她伸出手臂，从瓶里倒出一滴东西滴在雪橇旁边的雪地上。

sentences.en: Trekking through the snow pulling a sledge.
sentences.cn: 拖着雪橇在雪地里跋涉的人。
